metadata.title: CVE-2017-6848 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The PoDoFo::PdfXObject::PdfXObject function in PdfXObject.cpp in PoDoFo 0.9.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted file. Agostino Sarubbo discovered that PoDoFo mishandled certain crafted PDF files, resulting in a NULL pointer dereference. If PoDoFo were to open a malicious PDF, an attacker could cause PoDoFo to crash.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.5-9').
